com.cloudgarden.speech
Class CGResultAudioClip

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.cloudgarden.speech.CGResultAudioClip
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.applet.AudioClip
public class CGResultAudioClip
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.applet.AudioClip

Allows audio data from a recognized utterance to be played back or saved to a WAVE file.

saveToFile

public void saveToFile(java.lang.String fileName)
Allows the audio data from a recognized sample of speech to be saved to a file - the fileName parameter should be the name (new or already existing) of a WAVE file. Will do nothing if no audio data is available.

stop

public void stop()
Specified by:
stop in interface java.applet.AudioClip
